mapper.insert: insert into cs_agents (id, agent_id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminals_quantity, status, address, reason, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, cs_agent_marks_id, terminals_list) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalsQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csAgentMarksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalsList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cs_agents set agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminals_quantity = #{terminalsQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cs_agent_marks_id = #{csAgentMarksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminals_list = #{terminalsList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminals_quantity, status, address, reason, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, cs_agent_marks_id, terminals_list from cs_agents where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
